name: KinderTown
overview:
The KinderTown provides parents with the best educational apps for kids.

Available as a universal app for the iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch, KinderTown helps parents find the best educational apps for their preschoolers by listing only the apps it believes are of the highest quality and then organizing those apps around educational subject and target age range.

KinderTown selects its apps through a review process that involves educators, parents, and kids themselves.

KinderTown’s was created to fulfill the mission of improving early childhood education by empowering parents with tools to be better teachers. The KinderTown app is the first step towards developing a complete mobile learning platform for preschoolers and young kids.
